mapper.insert: insert into com_user_materiel_application (id, create_time, modify_time, user_id, user_mail, status, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select id, create_time, modify_time, user_id, user_mail, status, remark from com_user_materiel_application
